  1. 352: Arrow Valley Lake

    Dec 20, 2011

    I think I might have gone overboard with the processing of some of these. It makes me wonder whether I should just post exactly what comes out of the camera, rather than wasting loads of time on processing only to end up hating what I did.

    Still, a fun Sunday morning at the frozen Arrow Valley Lake.
